sentences.sContent: She was accused in 1974 of poisoning her second husband, Charles.
sentences.sCn: 1974 年她被控毒死了她的第二任丈夫查尔斯。

sentences.sContent: He killed several people by poisoning their tea.
sentences.sCn: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。
